messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We are hearing that you have two different Beau's and it is confusing, we propose that the real one is decided via boxing match

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: We at Nanotrasen are proud to announce a martial arts tournament. All martial artists go to the boxing ring and we will create the bracket. The grand prize will be either an advanced martial art of your choosing or a supreme sword of mass destruction.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: If only 1 martial artist shows up to the boxing ring he shall receive the prize, please come soon

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Anyone can be a martial artist, all you need is your fists and some courage. Come to the boxing ring now!

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: The tournament shall begin shortly. Any last minute contestants arrive now!

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Garden.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Be careful the warden has won the prize of the supermatter sword, prolonged exposure to the sword will cause radiation poisoning

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Additionally, congratulations to the warden for winning the fighting tournament

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Atmos.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Classified Message

A report has been downloaded and printed out at all communications consoles.
